description: Through Primal Reversion and with nature's full power, it will take back its true form. It can summon storms that cause the sea levels to rise.

name: Groudon
description: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

name: Rayquaza
description: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

name: Jirachi
description: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

name: Deoxys
description: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in Deoxys. The crystalline organ on this Pokémon's chest appears to be its brain.

name: Turtwig
description: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.

name: Grotle
description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra
description: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.

name: Chimchar
description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.

name: Monferno
description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

name: Infernape
description: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.

name: Piplup
description: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.

name: Prinplup
description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon
description: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

name: Starly
description: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

name: Staravia
description: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.

name: Staraptor
description: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

name: Bibarel
description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Kricketot
description: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.

name: Kricketune
description: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

name: Shinx
description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: Luxio
description: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.

name: Luxray
description: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey—even those taking shelter behind a wall.

name: Budew
description: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.

name: Roserade
description: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.

name: Cranidos
description: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.

name: Rampardos
description: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.

name: Shieldon
description: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.

name: Bastiodon
description: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.

name: Burmy
description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

name: Mothim
description: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.

name: Combee
description: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

name: Vespiquen
description: It houses its colony in cells in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding.

name: Pachirisu
description: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

name: Buizel
description: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.

name: Floatzel
description: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

name: Cherubi
description: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.

name: Cherrim
description: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.

name: Shellos
description: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.

name: Gastrodon
description: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.

name: Ambipom
description: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.

name: Drifloon
description: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

name: Drifblim
description: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.

name: Buneary
description: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.

name: Lopunny
description: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.

name: Mismagius
description: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.

name: Honchkrow
description: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called “Summoner of Night.”

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Purugly
description: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

name: Chingling
description: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: Skuntank
description: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

name: Bonsly
description: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.

name: Mime Jr.
description: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!

name: Happiny
description: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

name: Spiritomb
description: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

name: Gible
description: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.

name: Gabite
description: It loves sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.

name: Garchomp
description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: Munchlax
description: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.

name: Riolu
description: It uses the shapes of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.

name: Lucario
description: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.

name: Hippopotas
description: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

name: Hippowdon
description: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.

name: Skorupi
description: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

name: Drapion
description: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.

name: Croagunk
description: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

name: Toxicroak
description: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: Finneon
description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

name: Lumineon
description: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

name: Mantyke
description: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.

name: Snover
description: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.

name: Abomasnow
description: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as “The Ice Monster.”

name: Weavile
description: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.

name: Magnezone
description: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.

name: Lickilicky
description: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

name: Rhyperior
description: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.

name: Tangrowth
description: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

name: Electivire
description: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.

name: Magmortar
description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

name: Togekiss
description: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.

name: Yanmega
description: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads instantly while flying by at high speed.

name: Leafeon
description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

name: Glaceon
description: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.

name: Gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

name: Mamoswine
description: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.

name: Porygon-Z
description: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

name: Gallade
description: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.

name: Probopass
description: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

name: Dusknoir
description: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.

name: Froslass
description: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

name: Rotom
description: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.

name: Uxie
description: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

name: Mesprit
description: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: Azelf
description: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

name: Dialga
description: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.

name: Palkia
description: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

name: Heatran
description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: Regigigas
description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

name: Cresselia
description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Phione
description: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.

name: Manaphy
description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Darkrai
description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

name: Arceus
description: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.

name: Victini
description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

name: Snivy
description: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.

name: Servine
description: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

name: Serperior
description: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior's noble eyes.

name: Tepig
description: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

name: Pignite
description: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.

name: Emboar
description: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Oshawott
description: The scalchop on its stomach isn't just used for battle—it can be used to break open hard berries as well.

name: Dewott
description: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

name: Samurott
description: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.

name: Patrat
description: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.

name: Watchog
description: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.

name: Lillipup
description: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.

name: Herdier
description: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.

name: Stoutland
description: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.

name: Purrloin
description: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.

name: Liepard
description: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

name: Pansage
description: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.

name: Simisage
description: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

name: Pansear
description: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.

name: Simisear
description: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.

name: Panpour
description: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.

name: Simipour
description: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.

name: Munna
description: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.

name: Musharna
description: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

name: Pidove
description: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.

name: Tranquill
description: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.

name: Unfezant
description: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females' flying abilities surpass those of the males.

name: Blitzle
description: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

name: Zebstrika
description: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

name: Roggenrola
description: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

name: Boldore
description: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.

name: Gigalith
description: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.

name: Woobat
description: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

name: Swoobat
description: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.

name: Drilbur
description: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.

name: Excadrill
description: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

name: Audino
description: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.

name: Timburr
description: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.

name: Gurdurr
description: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.

name: Conkeldurr
description: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

name: Tympole
description: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.

name: Palpitoad
description: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

name: Seismitoad
description: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.

name: Throh
description: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.

name: Sawk
description: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

name: Sewaddle
description: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.

name: Swadloon
description: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

name: Leavanny
description: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.

name: Venipede
description: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.

name: Whirlipede
description: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

name: Scolipede
description: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.

name: Cottonee
description: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.

name: Whimsicott
description: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.

name: Petilil
description: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

name: Lilligant
description: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a Trainer does not take good care of it.

name: Basculin
description: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.

name: Sandile
description: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.

name: Krokorok
description: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

name: Krookodile
description: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.

name: Darumaka
description: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.

name: Darmanitan
description: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.

name: Maractus
description: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

name: Dwebble
description: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.

name: Crustle
description: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.

name: Scraggy
description: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.

name: Scrafty
description: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.

name: Sigilyph
description: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.

name: Yamask
description: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.

name: Cofagrigus
description: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

name: Tirtouga
description: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.

name: Carracosta
description: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

name: Archen
description: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.

name: Archeops
description: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

name: Trubbish
description: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.

name: Garbodor
description: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

name: Zorua
description: It changes so it looks just like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.

name: Zoroark
description: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

name: Minccino
description: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails.

name: Cinccino
description: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.

name: Gothita
description: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

name: Gothorita
description: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.

name: Gothitelle
description: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

name: Solosis
description: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.

name: Duosion
description: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

name: Reuniclus
description: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.

name: Ducklett
description: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Vanillite
description: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillish
description: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.

name: Vanilluxe
description: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.

name: Deerling
description: Their coloring changes according to the seasons and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.

name: Sawsbuck
description: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns.

name: Emolga
description: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.

name: Karrablast
description: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

name: Foongus
description: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

name: Amoonguss
description: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.

name: Frillish
description: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.

name: Jellicent
description: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.

name: Alomomola
description: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.

name: Joltik
description: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.

name: Galvantula
description: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.

name: Ferroseed
description: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.

name: Ferrothorn
description: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.

name: Klink
description: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.

name: Klang
description: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feelings to others. When angry, it rotates faster.

name: Klinklang
description: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.

name: Tynamo
description: While one alone doesn't have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

name: Eelektrik
description: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.

name: Eelektross
description: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.

name: Elgyem
description: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.

name: Beheeyem
description: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.

name: Litwick
description: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

name: Lampent
description: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.

name: Chandelure
description: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.

name: Axew
description: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.

name: Fraxure
description: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.

name: Haxorus
description: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.

name: Cubchoo
description: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.

name: Beartic
description: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.

name: Cryogonal
description: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.

name: Shelmet
description: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.

name: Accelgor
description: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.

name: Stunfisk
description: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.

name: Mienfoo
description: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.

name: Mienshao
description: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

name: Druddigon
description: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

name: Golett
description: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.

name: Golurk
description: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.

name: Pawniard
description: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.

name: Bisharp
description: This pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.

name: Bouffalant
description: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.

name: Rufflet
description: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.

name: Braviary
description: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.

name: Vullaby
description: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.

name: Mandibuzz
description: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.

name: Heatmor
description: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.

name: Durant
description: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.

name: Deino
description: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.

name: Zweilous
description: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.

name: Hydreigon
description: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.

name: Larvesta
description: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.

name: Volcarona
description: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.

name: Cobalion
description: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.

name: Terrakion
description: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.

name: Virizion
description: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.

name: Tornadus
description: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.

name: Thundurus
description: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.

name: Reshiram
description: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.

name: Zekrom
description: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.

name: Landorus
description: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as “The Guardian of the Fields.”

name: Kyurem
description: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.

name: Keldeo
description: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.

name: Meloetta
description: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.

name: Genesect
description: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.

name: Chespin
description: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.

name: Quilladin
description: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

name: Chesnaught
description: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

name: Fennekin
description: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Braixen
description: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

name: Delphox
description: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.

name: Froakie
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: Frogadier
description: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: Greninja
description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

name: Bunnelby
description: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

name: Diggersby
description: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.

name: Fletchling
description: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.

name: Fletchinder
description: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

name: Talonflame
description: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.

name: Scatterbug
description: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.

name: Spewpa
description: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

name: Vivillon
description: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.

name: Litleo
description: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.

name: Pyroar
description: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.

name: Flabébé
description: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.

name: Floette
description: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.

name: Florges
description: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.

name: Skiddo
description: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.

name: Gogoat
description: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

name: Pancham
description: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.

name: Pangoro
description: Although it possesses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.

name: Furfrou
description: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.

name: Espurr
description: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.

name: Meowstic
description: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.

name: Honedge
description: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.

name: Doublade
description: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.

name: Aegislash
description: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.

name: Spritzee
description: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragrance changes depending on what it has eaten.

name: Aromatisse
description: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

name: Swirlix
description: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.

name: Slurpuff
description: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.

name: Inkay
description: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.

name: Malamar
description: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.

name: Binacle
description: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.

name: Barbaracle
description: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

name: Skrelp
description: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.

name: Dragalge
description: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

name: Clauncher
description: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.

name: Clawitzer
description: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.

name: Helioptile
description: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.

name: Heliolisk
description: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.

name: Tyrunt
description: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.

name: Tyrantrum
description: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

name: Amaura
description: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.

name: Aurorus
description: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.

name: Sylveon
description: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.

name: Hawlucha
description: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.

name: Dedenne
description: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.

name: Carbink
description: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.

name: Goomy
description: The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.

name: Sliggoo
description: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.

name: Goodra
description: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

name: Klefki
description: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

name: Phantump
description: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.

name: Trevenant
description: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.

name: Pumpkaboo
description: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.

name: Gourgeist
description: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.

name: Bergmite
description: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.

name: Avalugg
description: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.

name: Noibat
description: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.

name: Noivern
description: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.

name: Xerneas
description: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.

name: Yveltal
description: When this legendary Pokémon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

name: Zygarde
description: This is Zygarde's form when it has gathered 50% of its cells. It wipes out all those who oppose it, showing not a shred of mercy.

name: Diancie
description: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.

name: Hoopa
description: In its true form, it possesses a huge amount of power. Legends of its avarice tell how it once carried off an entire castle to gain the treasure hidden within.

name: Volcanion
description: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It's said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

name: Rowlet
description: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.

name: Dartrix
description: A bit of a dandy, it spends its free time preening its wings. Its preoccupation with any dirt on its plumage can leave it unable to battle.

name: Decidueye
description: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.

name: Litten
description: While grooming itself, it builds up fur inside its stomach. It sets the fur alight and spews fiery attacks, which change based on how it coughs.

name: Torracat
description: At its throat, it bears a bell of fire. The bell rings brightly whenever this Pokémon spits fire.

name: Incineroar
description: This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition. If it's not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its Trainer's orders with complete nonchalance.

name: Popplio
description: This Pokémon snorts body fluids from its nose, blowing balloons to smash into its foes. It's famous for being a hard worker.

name: Brionne
description: A skillful dancer, it creates a sequence of water balloons as it dances, and briskly bombards its enemies.

name: Primarina
description: It controls its water balloons with song. The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.

name: Pikipek
description: It can peck at a rate of 16 times a second to drill holes in trees. It uses the holes for food storage and for nesting.

name: Trumbeak
description: It eats berries and stores their seeds in its beak. When it encounters enemies or prey, it fires off all the seeds in a burst.

name: Toucannon
description: When it battles, its beak heats up. The temperature can easily exceed 212 degrees Fahrenheit, causing severe burns when it hits.

name: Yungoos
description: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.

name: Gumshoos
description: When it finds a trace of its prey, it patiently stakes out the location...but it's always snoozing by nightfall.

name: Grubbin
description: Its strong jaw enables it to scrape trees and slurp out the sap. It normally lives underground.

name: Charjabug
description: Its body is capable of storing electricity. On camping trips, people are grateful to have one around.

name: Vikavolt
description: It zips around, on sharp lookout for an opening. It concentrates electrical energy within its large jaws and uses it to zap its enemies.

name: Crabrawler
description: While guarding its weak points with its pincers, it looks for an opening and unleashes punches. When it loses, it foams at the mouth and faints.

name: Crabominable
description: It aimed for the top but got lost and ended up on a snowy mountain. Being forced to endure the cold, this Pokémon evolved and grew fur.

name: Oricorio
description: It beats its wings together to create fire. As it moves in the steps of its beautiful dance, it bathes opponents in intense flames.

name: Cutiefly
description: It feeds on the nectar and pollen of flowers. Because it's able to sense auras, it can identify which flowers are about to bloom.

name: Ribombee
description: It rolls up pollen into puffs. It makes many different varieties, some used as food and others used in battle.

name: Rockruff
description: It's considered to be a good Pokémon for beginners because of its friendliness, but its disposition grows rougher as it grows up.

name: Lycanroc
description: Its quick movements confuse its enemies. Well equipped with claws and fangs, it also uses the sharp rocks in its mane as weapons.

name: Wishiwashi
description: When it's in trouble, its eyes moisten and begin to shine. The shining light attracts its comrades, and they stand together against their enemies.

name: Mareanie
description: It plunges the poison spike on its head into its prey. When the prey has weakened, Mareanie deals the finishing blow with its 10 tentacles.

name: Toxapex
description: Toxapex crawls along the ocean floor on its 12 legs. It leaves a trail of Corsola bits scattered in its wake.

name: Mudbray
description: The mud stuck to Mudbray's hooves enhances its grip and its powerful running gait.

name: Mudsdale
description: It spits a mud that provides resistance to both wind and rain, so the walls of old houses were often coated with it.

name: Dewpider
description: It crawls onto the land in search of food. Its water bubble allows it to breathe and protects its soft head.

name: Araquanid
description: It delivers headbutts with the water bubble on its head. Small Pokémon get sucked into the bubble, where they drown.

name: Fomantis
description: During the day, it sleeps and soaks up light. When night falls, it walks around looking for a safer place to sleep.

name: Lurantis
description: It requires a lot of effort to maintain Lurantis's vivid coloring, but some collectors enjoy this work and treat it as their hobby.

name: Morelull
description: It scatters spores that flicker and glow. Anyone seeing these lights falls into a deep slumber.

name: Shiinotic
description: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.

name: Salandit
description: It burns its bodily fluids to create a poisonous gas. When its enemies become disoriented from inhaling the gas, it attacks them.

name: Salazzle
description: For some reason, only females have been found. It creates a reverse harem of male Salandit that it lives with.

name: Stufful
description: Despite its adorable appearance, when it gets angry and flails about, its arms and legs could knock a pro wrestler sprawling.

name: Bewear
description: This immensely dangerous Pokémon possesses overwhelming physical strength. Its habitat is generally off-limits.

name: Bounsweet
description: A delectable aroma pours from its body. They are often swallowed whole by Toucannon lured by that wafting deliciousness.

name: Steenee
description: The sepals on its head developed to protect its body. These are quite hard, so even if pecked by bird Pokémon, this Pokémon is totally fine.

name: Tsareena
description: Its long, striking legs aren't just for show but to be used to kick with skill. In victory, it shows off by kicking the defeated, laughing boisterously.

name: Comfey
description: It attaches flowers to its highly nutritious vine. This revitalizes the flowers, and they give off an aromatic scent.

name: Oranguru
description: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it's best suited to veteran Trainers.

name: Passimian
description: They form groups of roughly 20 individuals. Their mutual bond is remarkable—they will never let down a comrade.

name: Wimpod
description: This Pokémon is a coward. As it desperately dashes off, the flailing of its many legs leaves a sparkling clean path in its wake.

name: Golisopod
description: With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws, it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

name: Sandygast
description: Born from a sand mound playfully built by a child, this Pokémon embodies the grudges of the departed.

name: Palossand
description: Possessed people controlled by this Pokémon transformed its sand mound into a castle. As it evolved, its power to curse grew ever stronger.

name: Pyukumuku
description: It lives in shallow seas, such as areas near a beach. It can eject its internal organs, which it uses to engulf its prey or battle enemies.

name: Type: Null
description: The heavy control mask it wears suppresses its intrinsic capabilities. This Pokémon has some hidden special power.

name: Silvally
description: Its trust in its partner is what awakens it. This Pokémon is capable of changing its type, a flexibility that is well displayed in battle.

name: Minior
description: Originally making its home in the ozone layer, it hurtles to the ground when the shell enclosing its body grows too heavy.

name: Komala
description: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

name: Turtonator
description: The shell on its back is chemically unstable and explodes violently if struck. The hole in its stomach is its weak point.

name: Togedemaru
description: The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest. When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur stands on end and stabs into its attackers.

name: Mimikyu
description: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

name: Bruxish
description: When it unleashes its psychic power from the protuberance on its head, the grating sound of grinding teeth echoes through the area.

name: Drampa
description: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.

name: Dhelmise
description: Swinging its massive anchor, it can KO Wailord in a single blow. What appears to be green seaweed is actually its body.

name: Jangmo-o
description: It expresses its feelings by smacking its scales. Metallic sounds echo through the tall mountains where Jangmo-o lives.

name: Hakamo-o
description: It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout. Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.

name: Kommo-o
description: When it spots enemies, it threatens them by jingling the scales on its tail. Weak opponents will crack and flee in panic.

name: Tapu Koko
description: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity. It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.

name: Tapu Lele
description: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.

name: Tapu Bulu
description: It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings them around. It causes vegetation to grow, and then it absorbs energy from the growth.

name: Tapu Fini
description: The dense fog it creates brings the downfall and destruction of its confused enemies. Ocean currents are the source of its energy.

name: Cosmog
description: Its body is gaseous and frail. It slowly grows as it collects dust from the atmosphere.

name: Cosmoem
description: Motionless as if dead, its body is faintly warm to the touch. In the distant past, it was called the cocoon of the stars.

name: Solgaleo
description: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.

name: Lunala
description: It is said to be a female evolution of Cosmog. When its third eye activates, away it flies to another world.

name: Nihilego
description: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.

name: Buzzwole
description: This Ultra Beast appeared from another world. It shows off its body, but whether that display is a boast or a threat remains unclear.

name: Pheromosa
description: One of the dangerous Ultra Beasts, it has been spotted running across the land at terrific speeds.

name: Xurkitree
description: One of the mysterious life-forms known as Ultra Beasts. Astonishing electric shocks emanate from its entire body, according to witnesses.

name: Celesteela
description: It appeared from the Ultra Wormhole. Witnesses observed it flying across the sky at high speed.

name: Kartana
description: This Ultra Beast came from the Ultra Wormhole. It seems not to attack enemies on its own, but its sharp body is a dangerous weapon in itself.

name: Guzzlord
description: It has gobbled mountains and swallowed whole buildings, according to reports. It's one of the Ultra Beasts.

name: Necrozma
description: Reminiscent of the Ultra Beasts, this life-form, apparently asleep underground, is thought to have come from another world in ancient times.

name: Magearna
description: This artificial Pokémon, constructed more than 500 years ago, can understand human speech but cannot itself speak.

name: Marshadow
description: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics  their powers and movements. As it improves, it  becomes stronger than those it's imitating.

name: Poipole
description: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be  chosen as a first partner in its own world.

name: Naganadel
description: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid  inside its body. It is one of the organisms known  as UBs.

name: Stakataka
description: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one  appears to be made up of many life-forms  stacked one on top of each other.

name: Blacephalon
description: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning,  it triggers the explosion of its own head.  It's apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: Zeraora
description: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they'll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

name: Meltan
description: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.

name: Melmetal
description: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
